t: Patrick Cain Designs — Karen Alweil Studio
s: Patrick Cain is not your conventional Los Angeles-based designer and artist. Before Patrick Cain Designs, he was a nuclear materials scientist, hair model, reporter, and pie baker. In fact, he never intended to own a design company – or even be a creative. His journey began around 2012.
